title: afk`rs Go play PvE or better Tetris
body: It`s so annoing, just played 2 games w afk`ers I just left second game and now writing this... PLEASE!!! Make that Afk`res are banned to enter PvP games. Those who saying :"I got life...", shouldnt be able enter PvP`s.

replies.body: I mean, you are an afker too now since you left that game while it was still being played out.

I dont know and am not totally sure what you are event trying to say.. 

I am just trying to figure out what your native language is.. nothing matches that unreadable trainwreck.
I think reports for Leaving and AFKing need to be taken more seriously. I like the '3 strike system' idea you have here but I don't think it should lead to a perma. Maybe 3 Strikes for a month ban?
